summary: Purity is an all-in-one visual mod for exteriors (weather, lighting, water, waterfalls, landscape textures). It is a substancial update of the visual and immersion mods I've created during the last 5 years, compiled in one file. My last contribution.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]
Purity is a substancial update of the visual and immersion mods I've created during the last 5 years, compiled in one file. If you are a Pure Weather user, you can consider Purity's weather part as a [b]Pure Weather version 3.0[/b]. A new [b]version 2.0 of Pure Waterfalls[/b] is also included, as well as an [b]improved version (6.0) of Pure Waters[/b]. [b]All of these versions are exclusive to Purity.[/b][/size]

[center][size=5]
[youtube]Gu_Bv9XjMlA[/youtube]

[/size][size=5]This is my last contribution.[/size][/center]




[b][size=3]About this mod:
[/size][/b][size=5][size=3]
Purity is a complete graphics overhaul for Skyrim's exteriors. It gives to TES5 the visual and the beauty that this great game deserves. From impressive sunsets to scary nights; from icy blizzards to violent storms, get ready for a brand new level of immersion ...and contemplation!

Purity is the completion of hundreds hours of passionate work during the last 5 years, with only one thing in mind: [b]making Skyrim visually stunning without performance loss[/b]. No matter your rig, if it can run the game with more than 30fps, then you can enjoy Purity's graphics!

Purity has been also created with maximum compatibility as a priority, [b]so it will work fine with any other game modification[/b], excepted of course other weather/water mods. [b]Using ENB/SweetFX with Purity is not recommended.[/b]

Please make sure to read carefully the [url=https://www.evernote.com/shard/s548/sh/ab2957ac-d59b-4da2-bc5b-ebefa950d35a/074dc76df4c9afd0f90f1d19ab49ddd9] Purity's readme [/url]

[b]This mod requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLCs.[/b]

[b]Features:[/b]

[size=5][size=3][b]- Immersive weather:[/b][/size][/size]
[img]https://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/628742weather.jpg[/img]
More than 50 unique weathers for every regions of Skyrim, providing a large variety of cloudy, sunny, rainy, snowy and foggy days. Under a blazing sun or a driving rain you not only see the weather, you can actually feel it.

[size=5][size=3][b]- Natural lighting:[/b][/size][/size]
[img]https://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/976824lighting.jpg[/img]
Complete recast of exterior lighting, giving a natural and beautiful look to the game at any moment of the day. Not to mention the night, with a level of darkness which depends of the weather. Auroras now are a wonderful experience, but going outside at night during a blizzard or a storm might be a bit hazardous.

[size=5][size=3][b]- Unique Waterfalls:[/b][/size][/size]
[img]https://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/597564waterfall.jpg[/img]
Every waterfalls of the game have been entirely redone, using alternative meshes meticulously placed by hand. During your adventures across Skyrim, don't forget to visit the "Seven Wonderfalls", some of the most unique and spectacular waterfalls.

[size=5][size=3][b]- Pure Waters:[/b][/size][/size]
[img]https://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/402360water01.jpg[/img]
My [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?] popular water mod [/url] is included, providing a natural and graceful aspect to every water points of Skyrim. Purity's unique settings make the water more awesome than ever.

[size=5][size=3][b]- High quality textures included:[/b][/size][/size]
[img]https://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/585664textures02.jpg[/img]
More than 60 new exclusive HD textures provided, including clouds, rocks, sun, stars and many others.

[size=5][size=3][b]- Optional (but recommended) landscape textures:[/b][/size][/size]
[img]https://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/850762textures01.jpg[/img]
Beyond included textures, you can also install Purity's landscape textures which replace every landscape vanilla textures. It will give to your game the final touch for a new and complete immersive experience.

[size=5][size=3][size=5][size=3][b]- Cities retextures are also available in my Authentic Cities project:[/b][/size][/size][/size][/size]
[img]https://img15.hostingpics.net/pics/112539cities01.jpg[/img][size=5][size=3][b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73843/?]Authentic Whiterun[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73943/?]Authentic Solitude[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74100/?]Authentic Riften[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75027/?]Authentic Windhelm[/url]
[/b][/size][/size]
[/size][size=3]


Credits: 
- Bethesda for sharing the Creation Kit and for their personal support
- CGTextures.com
[/size][/size][size=3]
[/size]
author: Laast
